sentence: "The Governor of Georgia, Brian Kemp, and Secretary of State, Brad Raffensperger, perhaps in collusion with the Radical Left Democrats, have allowed a horrible thing to happen to a very popular Republican, Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene," Trump said in a statement Thursday.
author: Zoe Strozewski
title: Brad Raffensperger Sides With Judge, Keeps Marjorie Taylor Greene on Ballot
